items.sentence: I\'m pretty sure that Tom won\'t want to do that.
Tom wanted to take Mary in his arms and kiss her.
Tom wants to ask you some questions about French.
You should try to encourage Tom to do that again.
Tom woke up the next day with a painful hangover.
There\'s something important Tom didn\'t tell us.
I thought that you said that you weren\'t afraid.
Tom saw Mary looking at him from across the room.
Tom saw what he was looking for on the top shelf.
Tom never saw any wolves, but he could hear them.
